legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text:
🧵
Many hail #Didi & #Meituan, icons of #China’s gig economy, as employers that gave more equal footing for male and female employees. But a study shows that their seemingly gender-blind algorithm effectively penalizes female drivers.

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: While female drivers are penalized in many subtle ways by the algorithm, they are not adequately awarded for their advantages, including more caring service for passengers, more friendly for female passengers, and that they generally driving more responsibly. /7

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: Furthermore, many female gig workers complain of toxic working environments dominated by men. Some say their worker WeChat groups are often filled with inappropriate messages that are offensive to women. In response, some female gig workers formed their own WeChat groups. /8

legacy.full_text:
Our latest newsletter includes hot takes from Chinese experts on the implications of @SecBlinken's China visit. 

https://t.co/JT19bcZlbf

Key Takeaways ↓ https://t.co/er65Y6cvO1

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: ▲ While recognizing the meeting could set a stable tone for the rest of the year, the experts were reluctant to speculate on the course of bilateral ties going into 2024, especially with the looming U.S. presidential election.

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: ▲The experts are pleased with a shared desire for people-to-people exchanges between China and Washington but point to flight issues, security concerns, and red tape as reasons for a slow revival. End

legacy.full_text:
In celebrating #WorldEnvironmentDay2023, we look at a policy that perhaps China is more serious about than anybody else: planting trees.  

https://t.co/a308nwDaey https://t.co/6cp8AlkTgV

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text:
In this newsletter, you'll learn

What accomplishments did the decades-long effort achieve? 

Why has it been a consistent policy since PRC's founding?

How has it evolved to become more effective?

What original ways were invented by different regions to better plant trees?

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: Chinese Embassy in #Laos issued a rebuke against a recent @Reuters piece on the #ChinaLaosRailway, saying the report reflected a deep-seated bias and arrogance against China-Laos cooperation and the way of life of Laotians. https://t.co/EcY1YcTqyW

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text: it takes less than 3 days for agro-goods from Laos and Thailand to reach Chinese dinner tables. Laotians are becoming wealthier and enjoy more freedom of movement because of the railway, Reuters should have taken into account the voices of people along the railway.

legacy.description: Information and insight on everything related to China's interaction with the world
legacy.name: Beijing Channel

legacy.full_text:
4. According to Reuters' reasoning, Laotians should better stay put to avoid "spillover of risks". However, the best way to cope with future outbreaks is for people around the world to enjoy a higher standard of living. 
Link: https://t.co/whlOGZfNSy
